привет - POPDOG
Hola - POPDOG

哈喽 - FOOD
对于黑客来说，这是一个非常好的游戏，我喜欢黑客，所以我非常喜欢它。如果我是你，我会下载作弊文件

Das Spiel an sich ist mega nice. Jedoch die Community und die Entwickler sind so trash. Jede Runde cheater man kann nicht eine Runde normal zocken. Und dann bekommen noch die Leute die nicht cheaten einen schlechten Trustfaktor und werden gebannt. Was machen die Supporter genau NICHTS. Werde nie mehr das scheis Matchmaking spielen.
Старая добрая кс с тупой тимой на низких званиях и с большой возможностью заработать на новых кейсах
second best fps in the world (first is roblox phantom forces)

hitboxes 0/10
rank up system sucks
mm system sucks as well
very pog game. speak taco bell
if you like this game, you have a big pen15
très bon jeu et très addictif

This game is full with cheaters and trashy people. It is funny to play but disgusting to lose every second round because of the (mostly russian) mates, that are not able to call, shoot or move. All in all you can buy it but if you want to do something else, just burn it down. Same end.
i like the game, it's pretty ncie
nu mai juca mai bine iti faci o familie si ai 2 copii apoi te bucuri de viata stiind ca nu ai jucat cs go vreodata
Counter strike is fun and doesnt have many issues with it unless you are at the top level of competition
This game sucks don't get prime it's a waste of both your time and money ;-;

det er et supper sjovt og godt spil.
jeg har spillet det i nu 350 timer og vil gerne forsætte. 
hvis du ikke har spillet så syntes jeg at du skal komme igang
real nice game i play only mm

Csgo might seem scary when you play without prime. I would recommend either buying or getting rank 21 to obtain prime for the best experience. Otherwise this is a fenomenal game. I love games that might seem easy on the surface level, but in the long run it is an immensely complex game with tons of guns and maps to learn.
Almost as good as COD but suspiciously small install size.

Este jogo é uma valente merda. Eu ganho todas as partida e à primeira que perco desço. Esta merda para subir são precisos 2 anos, mas para descer é logo. Por favor melhorem a qualidade de subida e descida dos ranks.
Ik spil hvis du er noob, ellers fint spil.

Oyuncuların çoğu hile kullanmakta ve bunu engellemek hiçbir yaptırım bulunmakta. Yaptırım olsa bile bence çok yetersiz
Fun game with no cheater, even funnier!
